variants.name: rapier
variants.description: The Duelist's Grace Rapier is a masterpiece of weapon craftsmanship, designed for the agile fighter. Its slender blade is forged from the finest steel, offering unparalleled balance and responsiveness. This rapier thrums with a subtle metallic energy, enhancing each thrust and parry with surgical precision. It is said to have been the favored weapon of a legendary duelist whose skill was so great, he could disarm any opponent without drawing blood.
